trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Swarm of Proboscises
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) Piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) Piercing damage if the swarm is {@status Bloodied|XPHB}. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature in the swarm's space, the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 13}). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage at the end of each of its turns.
